name: Stalker_Melee.Electrical_Melee
display_help: Electricity surges through your body and you can channel this electricity through your fists. Electrical Melee allows you to pummel your foes with various melee attack powers while jolting them with a powerful electric current. Electric Melee powers can drain foes' Endurance and temporarily halt their Endurance recovery. Some powers may even return a portion of drained Endurance back to you.

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Electrical_Melee.Charged_Brawl
powers.display_help: Your fists become electrically charged and deliver a powerful punch. Charged Brawl can drain some Endurance from the target and may overload their synapses, leaving them writhing for a moment. A portion of drained Endurance may be returned to you. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release him. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: Only if hidden or target placated
10.00% chance for 2.0 sleep for 7.15s on target after 0.25s delay
10.00% chance for 2.0 sleep for 2s on target after 0.25s delay

Only against held or sleeping targets when not hidden

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Electrical_Melee.Havoc_Punch
powers.display_help: The Havoc Punch is a slower attack than Charged Brawl, but makes up for it with a greater damage. Havoc Punch can drain some Endurance from your target and may overload their synapses, leaving them writhing for a moment. A portion of the drained Endurance may be given back to you. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release him. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: Only if hidden or target placated

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Electrical_Melee.Jacobs_Ladder
powers.display_help: You are able to generate a strong current between your arms and snap a powerful bolt of electricity in an arc in front of you. This melee attack can electrocute all foes within the arc dealing High energy damage. Jacobs Ladder can drain some Endurance from your target and may overload their synapses, leaving them writhing for a moment. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release him. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 7 ft. radius 50° arc (5 targets max)

display_info: 10.00% chance for 2.0 sleep for 7.15s on target after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Electrical_Melee.Assassins_Strike
powers.display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior energy and smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Electrical_Melee.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Electrical_Melee.Placate
powers.display_help: Allows you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit or an Assassins Strike. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 15000.00% stealth radius for 10s on self after 0.25s delay
38000.00% stealth radius for 10s on self after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Electrical_Melee.Chain_Induction
powers.display_help: This Electric Melee attack deals moderate Smashing and Energy damage and may drain some of the targets Endurance. However, this attack also induces an unstable electric charge that may jump to another enemy target. The charge will jump to the closest enemy in range that has not been previously hit, until it inevitably dissipates. Enhancements will boost the effectiveness of the initial attack as well as the jumping charge. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Electrical_Melee.Lightning_Clap
powers.display_help: A massive attack. You smash your foes with all the power of a lightning bolt. The pummeled victim takes tremendous damage and may be Disoriented. Any nearby foes may be knocked down and take some damage from the shockwave as well as have some endurance drained. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee (AoE), High DMG(Smash, Energy), Foe Disorient, Knockback, -End

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Electrical_Melee.Lightning_Rod
powers.display_help: You can polarize your body and become a living Lightning Rod. This power calls forth a massive lightning bolt from the sky to strike you. You can then ride this bolt and instantly Teleport a short distance. You rematerialize in a massive bolt of electricity, dealing massive damage and knocking down all nearby foes. Damage from the lightning bolt is superior. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Superior DMG(Energy), Foe Knockback; Self Teleport;
